title: Red Line-Ashmont station-2b/1.5b; W/D, AC, elevator, modern brick blvd
map_address: Dorchester Ave near Msgr Patrick J Lydon Way
posting_body: Prime location of 8 min walk to Red Line Ashmont T station (0.4 mile).
3 min walk to stop for multiple buses(15, 18, 215).
5 min walk to bus stop for 22, 23, 26 and 45.
On a quiet side street but just minutes away from all the stores and restaurants on Dorchester Ave.
Modern 2 bed and 1.5 bath on 2nd floor unit of a brick/concrete building with elevator.
Additional storage space on the 1st floor.
Unit currently rented, photos were from before tenants moved in; unit will be repainted and new cabinet installed by Sept.1.
1 designated off-street parking, overnight visitor parking; plenty street parking
In a mostly owner occupied building, no loud parties, no pet, non smoker. Must have before tax monthly income larger than 3x rent, good credit score and reference.
1 year lease, first month and security deposit needed.
Rent include water and tenant pays electricity.
